resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?

An Tour Guide App 
This App suggests Top 5 
 	 - Heritage Places 
 	 - Luxury Hotels 
 	 - Cuisine & 
 	 - Adventure/Trip Places in India.
One of the Seven Wonders of the World Taj Mahal is Built with white marble by Emperor Shah Jahan, in memory of his wife Mumtaz after her death
Located in the capital city of India, Qutub Minar is the tall architectural beauty that adorns Delhi with its magnificence.
Sun temple aka Black Pagoda, is one of the most important temples in India. It\'s unique shape of a gigantic chariot accentuates its importance as a heritage site.
This monument in the state of Madhya Pradesh is the fine denotations of the Chandela Dynasty that existed before the invasion of the Mughals.
Spread over an area of 12 acres, the Mahabodhi Temple complex is a pilgrimage site of the Buddhists.
Taj Falaknuma Palace, the former palace of the Nizam of Hyderabad is now a Taj heritage hotel.
Matchless hospitality, award-wining restaurants, impeccable services are offered at Taj Lake Palace in Udaipur.
A picture-perfect location awaits your arrival at The Tamara in the mountains of Coorg.
Spread amid 7 acres of walkways, verdant beauty and a fountain, Trident Gurugram is an place of entertainment and food options for the guests.
Positioned at a height of 8250ft and in proximity of Shimla mall, Wildflower is a landmark of superior comfort, with spectacular views of Himalayas.
It\'s the perfect choice for foodies who prefer having their rice with spice, interspersed with tender peaces of meat or chicken.
This gorgeous plate is the reason every Punjabi takes pride a beautiful mix of spices, served with a dollop of melting cream or butter on top.
Chole Bhature is a dish from the Punjab region of the India. This dish is a combination of chana masala (spicy white chickpeas) and bhatura.
This steamed cake made from gram flour and channa dal is one of the best things to come out of Gujarat.
A famous Nawabi recipe from Lucknow. It is made with the finest meat of the lamb and a few spices.
A heaven for trekkers, but with a horrific twist as you head to the glacial Roopkund Lake. The path of this trek actually has hundreds of human skeletons scattered all over.
Goa is the ultimate destination for water adventure sports in India and flyboarding at Baina beach is truly amazing.
An Aerial view at Payyambalam beach would be a thrilling experience to watch the blue Arabian Sea while sailing over it up till 300ft in sky.
Ladakh is undoubtedly one of the best destination for an adventure trip in India. Which starts from Shimla and goes till Leh, crossing some of the spine chilling destinations!
Mysore is the best place for this adventurous trip in India with fascinating view of blue sky and extreme greenery sprawled across the valley.
